Document.name: Curry
Document.summary: Currize a functor in . Currizing means to create a new functor whose argument is the first argument of the original function. Calling this functor will return another functor whose arguments are all remaining arguments of the original function. Calling the returned function will call the original function.
Document.signature: template < typename T > Func<Func<function_binding::Binding<T>::CurriedType>( function_binding::Binding<T>::FirstParameterType)> Curry( Func<T> const & function );
